eu.trentorise.opendata.jackan

Class CkanClient.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.trentorise.opendata.jackan.CkanClient.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    CkanClient

    public static class CkanClient.Builder
extends Object
    Builder for the client. The builder is not threadsafe and you can use one builder instance to build only one client instance.
    Author:
    David Leoni

      • setCatalogUrl

        public CkanClient.Builder setCatalogUrl(String catalogUrl)
        Sets the catalog url i.e. http://data.gov.uk. Internally, it will be stored in a normalized format (to avoid i.e. trailing slashes).

      • setCkanToken

        public CkanClient.Builder setCkanToken(@Nullable
                              String ckanToken)
        Sets the private token string for ckan repository

      • setProxy

        public CkanClient.Builder setProxy(@Nullable
                          String proxyUrl)
        Sets the proxy used to perform GET and POST calls

      • setTimeout

        public CkanClient.Builder setTimeout(int timeout)
        Sets the connection timeout expressed as number of milliseconds. Must be greater than zero, otherwise IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - is value is less than 1.
